page.title: 15DITTON PRIORS SURGERY.
page.content: The building which is now the{Doctors {Surgery}was established in{1960}as a house for the village policeman.In{ {1968}it was transformed into a{Doctors {Surgery}which would cover an area of{ {200}sq miles.The{6}staff caters for an average of{130}patients a week with{ {2500}people in their care.The surgery is also a{Pharmacy}whose main medical suppliers are{Philip Harris}and{Co}of Birmingham and{Rudge Roberts}of Shrewsbury. The doctors have also got a specially designed{computer}which prints out the prescriptions and does an up-to-date sheet of the patients medication and lists of patients who need to be recalled for various tests. The{computers}job is to make the surgery more efficient because it covers such a large rural area. The doctors are{Dr.Kirk and Dr.Groves.
